
-------------------
Teste 1: matriz 3x3
-------------------


--- A ---
1.000000	3.000000	5.000000	
2.000000	4.000000	7.000000	
1.000000	1.000000	0.000000	

--- P ---
0.000000	1.000000	0.000000	
1.000000	0.000000	0.000000	
0.000000	0.000000	1.000000	

--- L ---
1.000000	0.000000	0.000000	
0.500000	1.000000	0.000000	
0.500000	-1.000000	1.000000	

--- U ---
2.000000	4.000000	7.000000	
0.000000	1.000000	1.500000	
0.000000	0.000000	-2.000000	

Fatoracao LU realizada com sucesso.

-------------------
Teste 2: matriz 4x4
-------------------


--- A ---
11.000000	9.000000	24.000000	2.000000	
1.000000	5.000000	2.000000	6.000000	
3.000000	17.000000	18.000000	1.000000	
2.000000	5.000000	7.000000	1.000000	

--- P ---
1.000000	0.000000	0.000000	0.000000	
0.000000	0.000000	1.000000	0.000000	
0.000000	1.000000	0.000000	0.000000	
0.000000	0.000000	0.000000	1.000000	

--- L ---
1.000000	0.000000	0.000000	0.000000	
0.272727	1.000000	0.000000	0.000000	
0.090909	0.287500	1.000000	0.000000	
0.181818	0.231250	0.003597	1.000000	

--- U ---
11.000000	9.000000	24.000000	2.000000	
0.000000	14.545455	11.454545	0.454545	
0.000000	0.000000	-3.475000	5.687500	
0.000000	0.000000	0.000000	0.510791	

Fatoracao LU realizada com sucesso.

-------------------

Solucao linear para o sistema: 

-------------------
x1		x2		x3			b
1.000000	3.000000	5.000000	=	0.000000
2.000000	4.000000	7.000000	=	0.000000
1.000000	1.000000	0.000000	=	0.000000

-------------------


--- A = Incognitas ---
1.000000	3.000000	5.000000	
2.000000	4.000000	7.000000	
1.000000	1.000000	0.000000	

--- B = Termos independentes ---
0.000000	
0.000000	
0.000000	

--- X = Resultado ---
1.000000	
3.000000	
-2.000000	

--- P = Pivo ---
0.000000	1.000000	0.000000	
1.000000	0.000000	0.000000	
0.000000	0.000000	1.000000	

-------------------

Solucao linear para o sistema: 

-------------------
x1		x2		x3		x4			b
4.000000	2.000000	-1.000000	1.000000	=	6.000000
8.000000	4.000000	2.000000	-2.000000	=	10.000000
1.000000	4.000000	2.000000	-2.000000	=	3.000000
2.000000	1.000000	-2.000000	6.000000	=	8.000000

-------------------


--- A = Incognitas ---
4.000000	2.000000	-1.000000	1.000000	
8.000000	4.000000	2.000000	-2.000000	
1.000000	4.000000	2.000000	-2.000000	
2.000000	1.000000	-2.000000	6.000000	

--- B = Termos independentes ---
6.000000	
10.000000	
3.000000	
8.000000	

--- X = Resultado ---
-1.#IND00	
-1.#IND00	
-1.#IND00	
-1.#IND00	

--- P = Pivo ---
0.000000	1.000000	0.000000	0.000000	
1.000000	0.000000	0.000000	0.000000	
0.000000	0.000000	1.000000	0.000000	
0.000000	0.000000	0.000000	1.000000
